name: Future Defense: You But Stronger
description:
Theme: I wish I knew this before now.

It is futile to defend your heart against the incoming horde so you will die.  However, when you do die you summon yourself but stronger.

WASD controls + Left click mouse

Your heart has 5 hp but you have a second round to survive.

Fissures on the ground can be hit to cause an eruption.
